FuncDef: This command enables port traffic monitoring.
CLIs: port <port-id> queue-group <queue-group-name> [ ingress | egress ] [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ] [ access | network ] [ instance <instance-id> ]
port <port-id> vport <name> [ interval <seconds> ] [ repeat <repeat> ] [ absolute | rate ]

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the queue group up to 32 characters.
Specifies the identification of a specific instance of the queue-group. Values-1 to 65535.
Specifies statistics are for an ingress queue group.
Specifies statistics are for an egress queue group.
Configures the interval for each display in seconds. Values-11 to 60. ParamDefault: Default- 11 seconds
Configures how many times the command is repeated. Values-1 to 999. ParamDefault: Default- 10
When the absolute keyword is specified, the raw statistics are displayed, without processing. No calculations are performed on the delta or rate statistics.
When the rate keyword is specified, the rate-per-second for each statistic is displayed.
Displays scheduler statistics applied on an access port.
Displays scheduler statistics applied on a network port.
